item.title: Training in Isolation
item.description: It is March 16th 2020 and COVID-19 is making everything difficult and awful. And while I’m anxious about the health of my friends and family I’m anxious about other minor things. One of those is that my local gym and the climbing wall I visit regularly will be forced to close. In part this is because the climbing wall is a social space, but I also have list of things I want to climb this summer1 that I know I need to be working now to achieve with a reasonable margin of safety.
